title: UC Davis Health offers highly accurate Alzheimer’s test
author: Lisa Howard
summary: UC Davis Health is now offering an FDA-approved test that can predict Alzheimer's disease before the onset of major symptoms.

title: New series from The Lancet offers roadmap for Alzheimer’s treatment in a changing therapeutic landscape
summary: New research from Geriatric Psychiatrist Helen C. Kales looks at strategies for integrating emerging and existing treatments for Alzheimer's disease.
